name: The Doors of Trithius
storyline: Following the king's disappearance, the kingdom teeters on the brink of chaos. The encroaching tide of monsters and magic has pushed humanity to the fringes. Amid the relentless struggle for survival, you will embark on a journey of skill mastery, intense battles with varied monsters, and unearthing the mysteries that lie within Enalia's vast and ancient dungeons.
summary: The Doors of Trithius is a RPG roguelike set in a randomly generated fantasy world. Level your skills and overcome your foes as you traverse the mysterious world of Enalia.
